Action.label:
INSTRUCTIONS:
Clone this template task and link it to a network by naming it after the WiFi SSID as follows, 'examplessid1'.
Next to categorise this Task name it as follows, '[CATEGORY]/examplessid1'. The text within the brackets such as '[RESTAURANT]' stipulates a category.
To group multiple SSIDs within the same Task name it as follows, '[CATEGORY]/examplessid1/examplessid2'.
Inside this task you will see 'examplessid1' or 'examplessid2' change these markers to your own WiFi SSIDs.
Note: A list of known WiFi SSIDs can be seen in the 'VARS' tab of this project within '%WiFiLIST'.
Variables available within your Task and their values: %par1 = enter/exit %par2 = SSID
<font color="red">üíÄ WARNING! üíÄ</font> <b>Altering this task may cause the Network Location project to stop functioning. Proceed with caution!
